RecordAggregationResult.name: RecordAggregationResult
RecordAggregationResult.description: Represents a data aggregation from one record to another record based on the record aggregation definition for the corresponding objects.

AggregateFromRecordId.description: The record from which data is aggregated.

AggregateToRecordId.description: The record to which data is aggregated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the record aggregation result.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this object.

RecordAggregationDefinitionId.description: The record aggregation definition for the data aggregation from the aggregate-from record to the aggregate-to record.
